projects.title: Modern Slat Wall
projects.description: Oak slat wood paneling brings warmth and texture to this contemporary living room, featuring integrated ambient lighting.

projects.title: Classic Wainscoting
projects.description: Elegant and timeless wainscoting adds a touch of classic sophistication to this formal dining area.

projects.title: Geometric Bedroom Accent
projects.description: A bespoke geometric panel accent wall creates a stunning focal point in this serene master bedroom.

projects.title: Board & Batten Hallway
projects.description: Crisp board and batten paneling elevates this entryway, adding character and architectural interest.

projects.title: 3D Office Feature
projects.description: A dynamic 3D wall panel installation adds a modern, creative flair to this home office space.

projects.title: Rustic Shiplap Charm
projects.description: Horizontal shiplap paneling provides a cozy, rustic charm in this inviting family room.
